official_title: A bill to amend the Interstate Commerce Act to provide authorizations for appropriations for the Interstate Commerce Commission for fiscal years 1976, 1977, and 1978.

summary.text: Authorizes under the Interstate Commerce Act appropriations for the Interstate Commerce Commission for fiscal years 1976, 1977, and 1978.
